name: DoneTalkingbyDigitalGrub
0:
”Alexa, open done talking”
”my login is 2240”
”add a log book train tickets on march 22 2020”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: done talking
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Digitalgrub's voice app for input logging and note-taking called Done Talking. 

Visit digitalgrub.com to create an account to use with your voice app.

Just say: "Alexa, open Digital grub" to launch the Digitalgrub voice app.
The Digitalgrub voice app will respond with "Please start talking. let me know when you are done talking."

After you enter a log or give our voice app input it will respond with "Log captured. Let me know when you are done talking."
An alternate response of our Digitalgrub voice app is "add a log" or "Please start talking. let me know when you are done talking."
